transition-your-reducer.title: Transition your reducer
transition-your-reducer.tldr: Even though we wrap our state in reducers, we still treat this state as just a bunch of values. In this article we will give structure and a relationship between these values and see what that enables us to do.

building-a-developer-blog.title: Building a developer blog with Next JS
building-a-developer-blog.tldr: I have been waiting for an opportunity to combine looking into new technology and building a new blog. Next JS version 9 was this opportunity. Let me tell you about it!

taking-immer-one-step-further.title: Taking Immer one step further
taking-immer-one-step-further.tldr: Immer has proven that many developers are not happy about boilerplating intentions in their code. But there is more boilerplating Immer can help us with. Join me on an experiment to see what modern JavaScript allows us to do!

concepts.title: CodeSandbox state machines with experimental tool
concepts.description: At CodeSandbox we deal with a lot of complexity and we are exploring how to best deal with this
